scripts.compile:arkoala: npm run --prefix ../arkui compile && npm run --prefix ../../incremental/compat compile:ohos
scripts.build: npm run cli-tools:check && cd app && DEVECO_SDK_HOME=../../ohos-sdk/ohos-sdk ../command-line-tools/hvigor/bin/hvigorw --no-daemon --mode module -p product=default -p module=arkoala@default assembleHar
scripts.arkoala:har: npm run --prefix ../../arkoala/ohos-sdk download && npm run copy && npm run bundle && npm run build
scripts.arkoala:har-arm32: npm run --prefix ../../arkoala/ohos-sdk download && npm run copy:arm32 && npm run bundle && npm run build
scripts.all: npm run native:clean && npm run compile:arkoala && npm run native:build && npm run arkoala:har
scripts.all-arm32: npm run native:clean && npm run compile:arkoala && npm run native:build-arm32 && npm run arkoala:har-arm32
scripts.cli-tools:download:bz: node ../ohos-sdk/scripts/openlab-cli.mjs download -p command-line-tools -v 5.0.3502 -f command-line-tools.5.0.3502.zip -d command-line-tools && npm run cli-tools:chmod:bz
scripts.cli-tools:download:yz: node ../ohos-sdk/scripts/gitlab-cli.mjs download -p deveco-tools -v 5.0.1300 -f deveco-tools.5.0.1300.zip -d command-line-tools && npm run cli-tools:chmod:yz
scripts.cli-tools:download: test "$KOALA_BZ" = "0" && npm run cli-tools:download:yz || npm run cli-tools:download:bz
